titleStmt.title: An order and declaration of his Highnes Council in Scotland, for the government thereof Prohibiting the bringing in of any arms or ammunition into Scotland, without licence.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Privy Council.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Christopher Higgins, in Harts-Close, over against the Trone-Church,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Given at Edinburgh the fifth day of June, 1656.
Order to print dated: Thursday the fifth day of June, 1656. Signed: Emanuel Downing, Cl. of the Council.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
